data.title: Washington Nationals Owners Explore Possible Sale
data.meta_description: The family of billionaire Ted Lerner is exploring changes in the ownership structure of the Washington Nationals baseball team, including the possibility of selling the franchise, the Washington Post reported.
data.text:
Billionaire family has hired Allen & Co. to research options

Team has no ‘expectation of a specific outcome,’ owner says

The family of billionaire Ted Lerner is exploring changes in the ownership structure of the Washington Nationals baseball team, including the possibility of selling the franchise, the Washington Post reported.

The Lerners have hired New York investment bank Allen & Co. to research potential investors, or possible buyers, for the team, according to a statement Monday from Mark Lerner , the principal managing owner.
